title: For the purpose of deciding authenticity of the structure if the approved plans of existing structure are not available, the Authority shall consider other evidences such as Assessment Record or City Survey Record or Sanad
clause_text: For the purpose of deciding authenticity of the structure if the approved plans of existing structure are not available, the Authority shall consider other evidences such as Assessment Record or City Survey Record or Sanad.
